channel.title: Need help setting up vps----offering payment
channel.description:
title says it all. I just bought a VPS i have no clue how to use it or host my server+client from it. It gave me a domain too, i have no clue what todo with ;)
i have this lovely 15$ itunes card here, i would be more than happy sending you the code to it in return for your assistance in helping me get this vps going :)
add me on msn
1st_pk_storm_rulz@live.com
